message.text: Successful.
message.description: The request was processed successfully.

message.text: The subscription has already been canceled.
message.description: The subscription has already been canceled.

message.text: The record has already been deleted.
message.description: The record has already been deleted.

message.text: No records found.
message.description: No records have been found that match your query.

message.text: The mobile device has been submitted for approval by the account administrator.
message.description: The mobile device was successfully inserted into the database.

message.text: The mobile device is approved and ready for use.
message.description: The mobile device was successfully registered and approved by the account administrator.

message.text: The Payment Gateway Account service (id=8) has already been accepted.
message.description: The Payment Gateway Account service (id=8) has already been accepted.

message.text: The Payment Gateway Account service (id=8) has already been declined.
message.description: The Payment Gateway Account service (id=8) has already been declined.

message.text: The APIUser already exists.
message.description: The APIUser already exists.

message.text: The merchant is activated successfully.
message.description: The merchant is activated successfully.

message.text: The merchant is not activated.
message.description: The merchant is not activated.

message.text: This feature has not yet been completed. One day it will be but it looks like today is not that day.
message.description: This is a work in progress. This message will not be released to production. It's just a dev placeholder.

message.text: An error occurred during processing. Please try again.
message.description: An unexpected system error occurred while processing this request.

message.text: The content-type specified is not supported.
message.description: The only supported content-types are text/xml and application/xml.

message.text: An error occurred while parsing the XML request.
message.description: This is the result of an XML parser error.

message.text: The name of the requested API method is invalid.
message.description: The name of the root node of the XML request is the API method being called. It is not valid.

message.text: The transaction key or API key is invalid or not present.
message.description: User authentication requires a valid value for transaction key or API key.

message.text: The API user name is invalid or not present.
message.description: User authentication requires a valid value for API user name.

message.text: User authentication failed due to invalid authentication values.
message.description: The API user name is invalid and/or the transaction key or API key is invalid.

message.text: User authentication failed. The account or API user is inactive.
message.description: The payment gateway, reseller, or user account is not currently active.

message.text: The payment gateway account is in Test Mode. The request cannot be processed.
message.description: The requested API method cannot be executed while the payment gateway account is in Test Mode.

message.text: User authentication failed. You do not have the appropriate permissions.
message.description: The user does not have permission to call the API.

message.text: Access denied. You do not have the appropriate permissions.
message.description: The user does not have permission to call the API method.

message.text: A duplicate subscription already exists.
message.description: A duplicate of the subscription was already submitted.

message.text: The field is invalid.
message.description: One of the field values is not valid.

message.text: A required field is not present.
message.description: One of the required fields was not present.

message.text: The field length is invalid.
message.description: One of the fields has an invalid length.

message.text: The field type is invalid.
message.description: The field type is not valid.

message.text: The start date cannot occur in the past.
message.description: The subscription start date cannot occur before the subscription submission date.

message.text: The credit card expires before the subscription start date.
message.description: The credit card is not valid as of the start date of the subscription.

message.text: The customer tax id or drivers license information is required.
message.description: The customer tax ID or driver's license information (driver's license number, driver's license state, driver's license DOB) is required for the subscription.

message.text: The payment gateway account is not enabled for eCheck.Net subscriptions.
message.description: The payment gateway account is not set up to process eCheck.Net subscriptions.

message.text: The payment gateway account is not enabled for credit card subscriptions.
message.description: The payment gateway account is not set up to process credit card subscriptions.

message.text: The interval length cannot exceed 365 days or 12 months.
message.description: The interval length must be 7 to 365 days or 1 to 12 months.

message.text: The subscription duration cannot exceed three years.
message.description: The number of total occurrences cannot extend the duration of the subscription beyond three years from the start date.

message.text: Trial Occurrences is required when Trial Amount is specified.
message.description: The number of trial occurrences cannot be zero if a valid trial amount is submitted.

message.text: Automated Recurring Billing is not enabled.
message.description: The payment gateway account is not enabled for Automated Recurring Billing.

message.text: Both Trial Amount and Trial Occurrences are required.
message.description: If either a trial amount or number of trial occurrences is specified then values for both must be submitted.

message.text: The transaction was unsuccessful.
message.description: An approval was not returned for the transaction.

message.text: Trial Occurrences must be less than Total Occurrences.
message.description: The number of trial occurrences specified must be less than the number of total occurrences specified.

message.text: Payment information is required.
message.description: Payment information is required when creating a subscription or payment profile.

message.text: The payment schedule is required.
message.description: A payment schedule is required when creating a subscription.

message.text: The amount is required.
message.description: The subscription amount is required when creating a subscription.

message.text: The start date is required.
message.description: The subscription start date is required to create a subscription.

message.text: The start date cannot be changed.
message.description: Once a subscription is created the start date cannot be changed.

message.text: The interval information cannot be changed.
message.description: Once a subscription is created the interval cannot be changed.

message.text: The subscription cannot be found.
message.description: The subscription ID for this request is not valid for this merchant.

message.text: The payment type cannot be changed.
message.description: Changing the subscription payment type between credit card and eCheck.Net is not currently supported.

message.text: The subscription cannot be updated.
message.description: Subscriptions that are expired, canceled or terminated cannot be updated.

message.text: The subscription cannot be canceled.
message.description: Subscriptions that are expired or terminated cannot be canceled.

message.text: A duplicate record already exists.
message.description: A duplicate of the customer profile, customer payment profile, or customer address was already submitted.

message.text: The record cannot be found.
message.description: The customer profile ID, payment profile ID, shipping address ID, or transaction ID for this request is not valid for this merchant.

message.text: One or more fields must contain a value.
message.description: All of the fields were empty or missing.

message.text: You cannot add more than {0} payment profiles.
message.description: The maximum number of payment profiles for the customer profile has been reached.

message.text: You cannot add more than {0} shipping addresses.
message.description: The maximum number of shipping addresses for the customer profile has been reached.

message.text: Customer Information Manager is not enabled.
message.description: The payment gateway account is not enabled for Customer Information Manager (CIM).

message.text: The root node does not reference a valid XML namespace.
message.description: The root node does not reference a valid XML namespace.

message.text: Generic InsertNewMerchant failure.
message.description: Generic InsertNewMerchant failure.

message.text: Merchant Boarding API is not enabled.
message.description: The reseller account is not enabled for Merchant Boarding API.

message.text: At least one payment method must be set in payment types or an echeck service must be provided.
message.description: The merchant account must be set up to accept credit card payments, eCheck payments, or both.

message.text: The operation timed out before it could be completed.
message.description: The database operation timed out before it could be completed.

message.text: Sell Rates cannot be less than Buy Rates
message.description: Cannot set a buyrate to less than the sellrate

message.text: The original transaction was not issued for this payment profile.
message.description: If customer profile ID, payment profile ID, and shipping address ID are included, they must match the original transaction.

message.text: The maximum number of elements for an array {0} is {1}.
message.description: The maximum number of elements for an array has been reached.

message.text: Server too busy
message.description: The server is currently too busy, please try again later.

message.text: The mobile device is not registered with this merchant account.
message.description: The mobile device identifier is not associated with the merchant account.

message.text: The mobile device has already been registered but is pending approval by the account administrator.
message.description: The mobile device exists but is in a pending status.

message.text: The mobile device has been disabled for use with this account.
message.description: The mobile device exists but has a status of disabled.

message.text: The user does not have permissions to submit requests from a mobile device.
message.description: The user does not have sufficient permissions to use a mobile device with this merchant account.

message.text: The merchant has met or exceeded the number of pending mobile devices permitted for this account.
message.description: The merchant has too many devices in a pending status.

message.text: The authentication type is not allowed for this method call.
message.description: The authentication type is not allowed for the requested method call.

message.text: The transaction type is invalid.
message.description: The transaction type is invalid.
Could not decrypt DUKPT blobs and returned error.

message.text: Fatal error when calling web service.
message.description: Fatal error when calling web service.

message.text: Calling web service return error.
message.description: Calling web service return error.

message.text: Client authorization denied.
message.description: Client authorization denied.

message.text: Prerequisite failed.
message.description: Prerequisite failed.

message.text: Invalid value.
message.description: Invalid value.

message.text: An error occurred while parsing the XML request. Too many {0} specified.
message.description: This is the result of an XML parser error. Too many nodes specified.

message.text: An error occurred while parsing the XML request. {0} is invalid.
message.description: This is the result of an XML parser error. The node is invalid.

message.text: The Payment Gateway Account service (id=8) has already been accepted. Decline is not allowed.
message.description: The Payment Gateway Account service (id=8) has already been accepted. Decline is not allowed.

message.text: The Payment Gateway Account service (id=8) has already been declined. Agree is not allowed.
message.description: The Payment Gateway Account service (id=8) has already been declined. Agree is not allowed.

message.text: {0} must contain data.
message.description: All of the fields were empty or missing.

message.text: Node {0} is required.
message.description: Required node missing.

message.text: {0} is invalid.
message.description: One of the field values is not valid.

message.text: This merchant is not associated with this reseller.
message.description: This merchant is not associated with this reseller.

message.text: An error occurred while parsing the XML request. Missing field(s) {0}.
message.description: This is the result of an XML parser error. Missing field(s).

message.text: {0} contains invalid value.
message.description: Invalid value.

message.text: The value of {0} is too long. The length of value should be {1}
message.description: Value too long.

message.text: Pending Status (not completed).
message.description: Pending Status (not completed).

message.text: The impersonation login ID is invalid or not present.
message.description: Impersonation partner login ID is invalid or not present.

message.text: The impersonation API Key is invalid or not present.
message.description: Impersonation API Key is invalid or not present.

message.text: Partner account is not authorized to impersonate the login account.
message.description: The partner account is not authorized to impersonate the login account.

message.text: Country for {0} is not valid.
message.description: Country is not valid.

message.text: Bank payment method is not accepted for the selected business country.
message.description: Bank payment method is not accepted for the selected business country.

message.text: Credit card payment method is not accepted for the selected business country.
message.description: Credit card payment method is not accepted for the selected business country.

message.text: State for {0} is not valid.
message.description: State is not valid.

message.text: Merchant has declined authorization to resource.
message.description: Merchant has declined authorization to resource.

message.text: No subscriptions found for the given request.
message.description: There are no subscriptions available for the merchant account for the type of subscriptions requested.

message.text: ProfileIds cannot be sent when requesting CreateProfile.
message.description: CreateProfile and profileIds are mutually exclusive, only one of them can be provided at a time.

message.text: Payment data is required when requesting CreateProfile.
message.description: When requesting CreateProfile payment data cannot be null.

message.text: PaymentProfile cannot be sent with payment data.
message.description: PaymentProfile and PaymentData are mutually exclusive, only one of them can be provided at a time.

message.text: PaymentProfileId cannot be sent with payment data.
message.description: PaymentProfileId and payment data are mutually exclusive, only one of them can be provided at a time.

message.text: ShippingProfileId cannot be sent with ShipTo data.
message.description: ShippingProfileId and ShipToAddress are mutually exclusive, only one of them can be provided at a time.

message.text: PaymentProfile cannot be sent with billing data.
message.description: PaymentProfile and Billing information are mutually exclusive, only one of them can be provided at a time.

message.text: Paging Offset exceeds the maximum allowed value.
message.description: Paging Offset exceeds allowed value. Check and lower the value.

message.text: ShippingProfileId is not provided within Customer Profile.
message.description: When using Customer Profile with Credit Card Info to specify Shipping Profile, Shipping Profile Id must be included.

message.text: Finger Print value is not valid.
message.description: Finger Print value is not valid.

message.text: Finger Print can't be generated.
message.description: Finger Print can't be generated.

message.text: Customer Profile ID or Shipping Profile ID not found.
message.description: Search for shipping profile using customer profile id and shipping profile id did not find any records.

message.text: Customer profile creation failed. This transaction ID is invalid.
message.description: Customer profile creation failed. This transaction ID is invalid.

message.text: Customer profile creation failed. This transaction type does not support profile creation.
message.description: Customer profile creation failed. This transaction type does not support profile creation.

message.text: Customer profile creation failed.
message.description: Error creating a customer payment profile from transaction.

message.text: Customer Info is missing.
message.description: Error creating a customer profile from transaction.
